Key Match Events: Blake Perkins made a diving catch to rob Noelvi Marte of a home run
Jackson Chourio hit a go-ahead home run in the ninth inning
Jake Bauers made a diving grab to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: David Bell expressed frustration after the loss
Bell was asked how he could get the Reds to play defense like the Brewers showed Saturday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game followed a concert by Diesel (Shaquille O'Neal)
Others: The Reds had one final chance in the ninth because of their two-out tenacity against Williams
Willy Adames put the Reds in a 3-0 hole with his third homer in as many games
